extendedInfo.description: Great collection of sounds from your favorite video games. There are many different high quality sounds.Great collection of sounds to remind videogames. Sounds like you can set the ringtones as notification or timer. The ringtones are classified by different categories, find sounds of classic games, old games and modern games.Do not miss the best ringtones, and draws attention.

reviews.title: :D love it
reviews.comment: It works perfectly fine !! And the ringtones are awesome !!! Love it :D
reviews.author: jessenia vargas

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Where\'s donkey Kong, Yoshi, Kirby, should have  all,Mario party characters. Can\'t find another app that comes closer to what i\'m looking for but, needs, more
reviews.author: james sticha

reviews.title: Great for people who love video music and sounds.
reviews.comment: Love this app!! Needs more games to choose from.
reviews.author: Kristal Haldeman

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: All the classic Mario sounds plus more. Wish it had more zelda sounds like navi but great any way
reviews.author: Stephen Lias

reviews.title: Absolute Brilliance!
reviews.comment: It really is good! also saves me tracking down little sounds I want for my phone Hehe Currently using #bluehog for my Ringtone , love the fact it\'s Sonic collecting rings Hehe it\'s like the perfect Ringtone for Retro gamers Awesome stuff! Well done :)
reviews.author: Robert Mcdonagh

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
reviews.comment: it has many of the old games for ringtones. you can choose longer ringtones or short ones like as a notice. just wish some of the ringtones were louder....
reviews.author: Lydia Williams

reviews.title: Exrtemely satisfied! :-) Thank you! :-D
reviews.comment: It would be cool if you added super metroid ones-my favorite is the opening song. Also when you start from a save point theme. Thanks! :-)
reviews.author: Chris Powell

reviews.title: Extra Dope
reviews.comment: Love it.. great quality.. great flashbacks
reviews.author: Keysean Johnson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: If you like it miss your vintage games, this is the app for you.
reviews.author: Audra Weber

reviews.title: I really like it
reviews.comment: It works great,easy to use.kind of needs more variety with the sounds,has lots of mario sounds which i think they are great.
reviews.author: leas villa

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Great sound.  The ability to assign then as ringtones and notifications is terriffic.  Could use some more classic sounds but hey.  Its free.
reviews.author: LOU ROD

reviews.title: Dope or nope
reviews.comment: Dope dope dope great app I would pay 100000 dollars for this app very usful before I couldn\'t hear my phone and my ringtone was boaring but now I can hear it and I can show how awsome thanks people who made it genius:D
reviews.author: Tim Cam

reviews.comment: Pretty good overall. Wish they would have had more songs though.
reviews.author: ashley forrest

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Best free collection of video game ring tones well worth the download.
reviews.author: Michael Munnett

reviews.title: Missing a few
reviews.comment: Missing a few, specifically zelda songs. But I hear there is a app for that, this just isn\'t that app. But what it does have it rather nice
reviews.author: Matt S

reviews.comment: I am happy to have found the Mario Bros sounds, they also sound better than the app I had on my old phone, which I can\'t seem to find in the play store anymore.
reviews.author: Alana Brockhaus

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Awesome, runs magnificently and has awesome almost all classic videogame sound effects and tunes...if you\'re a huge nerd or devoted gamer this is definitely the app to have.
reviews.author: nate castro

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I love all the ringtones but needs a full page of the legend of zelda because it would make it a very AWESOME application.
reviews.author: Georgie M

reviews.title: U have me a ringtone.
reviews.comment: Just keep up the good work, so far the app is what I was looking for.
reviews.author: Angel Aguilar

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Delivers what it promises!
reviews.author: Derek logue
